name: Policy Check –  Employee Meals & Entertainment Test
description: Identify employees with Meals & Entertainment over specified policy guideline threshold

name: Policy Check – Travel Meals Test
description: Identify employees with Travel Meals over specified policy guideline threshold

name: Policy Check – Third Party Meals & Entertainment Test
description: Identify employees with Third Party Meals & Entertainment over specified policy guideline threshold

name: Policy Check – Mobile Phone Expenses
description: T&E Mobile expenses - Identify employees with mobile phone or MiFi expenses over specified guideline threshold

name: Policy Check – Missing Documentation
description: T&E Policy Check – Identify employees with expenses without required documentation or purpose.

name: Fraud Check – Expenses During Time Off
description: T&E Fraud Check – Identify US region employees with reimbursement of travel expenses, transportation, meals/entertainment, or government official expenses incurred while on time-off.

name: Fraud Check – Duplicate Transportation Reimbursements
description: T&E Fraud Check – Identify employees with expense line items for reimbursements for mileage and car rental on the same day.
